casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Tryon COLLINGTON 290P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 27, 2018 Christopher J. Heaney, Attorney at Law, for Collington, Jeffrey Tryon Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of April 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of April 2018."
